over pull up a loop yarn over pull through all three loops color a- main color color b contrasting color r avel ed sti t c h page | 2 gauge with join at the top measure across the four rounds 4 rounds = 3 75 3 ¾ across materials h 5 0mm hook worsted weight yarn loops and threads impeccable solids/impeccable glitter optional stitch marker optional clover pom pom maker pattern *note  chain will not count as stitches throughout the entire pattern join should be done with first double_crochet of the row tightening the gauge just for the joining slip_stitch will help the seam not be as visible  hat is made as one piece but sections are separated to make the instructions easier  hat has the options to have the ear flaps or a regular beanie without them main hat round 1 with color a make a
